name: ResolveOrUpdateIncidentAlert
description:
Resolve an alert or update its associated incident.

Use this tool to resolve a specific alert or associate it with a different parent incident in PagerDuty. This is useful when managing incidents that require updates or resolution. Ensure you have `incidents.write` OAuth permissions before calling this tool.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the resource you want to update or resolve.

parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.description: The ID of the alert to resolve or update its parent incident.

value_schema.description: The id of the alert to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: user_email_address
parameters.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request. Ensure it is linked to the account with necessary permissions.

value_schema.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

parameters.name: alert_update_parameters
parameters.description: JSON object specifying the alert update details, such as status ('resolved' or 'triggered') and associated incident ID.

value_schema.description: The parameters of the alert to update.
